Room.Name: Highland Avenue/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Highland Avenue and Neilian Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Highland Avenue forms much of the eastern edge of the city. The large road runs north and south through the intersection with Neiliand Drive, which runs west out of the intersection. On the northwest corner of the road, you can see the omnimous Dragon's Citadel.
